fixes.name: Total expenses to sales  Ratio
fixes.dax_expression: (SUM('CoffeeChain Query (Sample - Cof (CoffeeChain DATASET)'[Total Expenses]) / SUM('CoffeeChain Query (Sample - Cof (CoffeeChain DATASET)'[Sales])) ) * 100
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau aggregations to DAX by qualifying columns with the table name. SUM([Total Expenses]) -> SUM('CoffeeChain Query (Sample - Cof (CoffeeChain DATASET)'[Total Expenses]) and SUM([Sales]) -> SUM('CoffeeChain Query (Sample - Cof (CoffeeChain DATASET)'[Sales]). Preserved the original arithmetic and multiplication by 100. Created as a measure because the formula contains aggregations.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (SUM), so it should be created as a measure.
